root.name: Hitman: Sniper Challenge
root.description: OverviewIn early May 2012 it was announced that I.O. Interactive would be releasing a downloadable mini-game called "Hitman Sniper Challenge" for people who pre-order Hitman: Absolution. Aside from competing for leaderboard high scores, the game allows players to unlock a sniper rifle called "Silenced Agency Kazo TRG" and 12 other weapon techniques that carry over into Hitman: Absolution.The game was later included in the Hitman HD Trilogy, however the unlockables are unable to be transferred to any other game.PC System RequirementsSupported operating systems: Microsoft ® Windows ® Vista / 7Dual Core Processor 2 GHz2 GB of RAM1.6 GB of free hard disk space3D-graphics adapter with 512 MB of memory (NV8600 or equivalent AMD)DirectX ® 10.0
